article_metadata.description: ObamaCare could be facing a Marie Antoinette moment. In case you didn't know, she was the Queen of France who reputedly said of the starving peasants, "let them eat cake." That was of course, just like telling someone who is hungry and broke, why don't you just eat at the [...]
